tool_description: Benchmarks pricing performance against historical periods, industry standards, and internal targets to provide performance context.

current_metrics.description: Array of current performance metric values

metric_names.description: Names corresponding to each metric value

benchmark_period.description: Historical period for comparison: last-quarter, last-year, or same-period-last-year

benchmark_type.description: Type of benchmarking: historical, industry, or target

error_messages: Metric array mismatch: current_metrics and metric_names arrays must have the same length.
Invalid benchmark period: Must be one of [last-quarter, last-year, same-period-last-year].
Invalid benchmark type: Must be one of [historical, industry, target].
Missing historical data: No historical data available for the specified benchmark period.
Invalid metric values: All metric values must be numeric and finite.
usage: Provide current_metrics array with corresponding metric_names, specify benchmark_period for historical comparison. Choose benchmark_type based on desired comparison baseline.

performance_scores.description: Performance scores for each metric compared to benchmark

improvement_areas.description: Metrics that show room for improvement

overall_performance_rating.description: Overall performance rating: excellent, above-average, average, or below-average
